org.apache.jasper

类 Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jasper.Constants

  • public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    Some constants and other global data that are used by the compiler and the runtime.
    作者:
    Anil K. Vijendran, Harish Prabandham, Shawn Bayern, Mark Roth

      Name of the ServletContext init-param that determines if the XML parsers will block the resolution of external entities.
      static java.lang.String XML_VALIDATION_INIT_PARAM
      Name of the ServletContext init-param that determines if the XML parsers used for web.xml files will be validating or not.
      static java.lang.String XML_VALIDATION_TLD_INIT_PARAM
      Name of the ServletContext init-param that determines if the XML parsers used for *.tld files will be validating or not.

    • 字段详细资料

      • JSP_SERVLET_BASE

        public static final java.lang.String JSP_SERVLET_BASE
        The base class of the generated servlets.

      • SERVICE_METHOD_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String SERVICE_METHOD_NAME
        _jspService is the name of the method that is called by HttpJspBase.service(). This is where most of the code generated from JSPs go.

      • SERVLET_CONTENT_TYPE

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_CONTENT_TYPE
        Default servlet content type.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STANDARD_IMPORTS

        public static final java.util.List<java.lang.String> STANDARD_IMPORTS

      • SERVLET_CLASSPATH

        public static final java.lang.String SERVLET_CLASSPATH
        ServletContext attribute for classpath. This is tomcat specific. Other servlet engines may choose to support this attribute if they want to have this JSP engine running on them.

      • JSP_FILE

        @Deprecated
public static final java.lang.String JSP_FILE
        已过时。 This will be removed in Tomcat 9.0.x onwards. It is replaced by the use of the jspFile servlet initialisation parameter
        Request attribute for <jsp-file> element of a servlet definition. If present on a request, this overrides the value returned by request.getServletPath() to select the JSP page to be executed.

      • DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE
        Default size of the JSP buffer.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • DEFAULT_TAG_BUFFER_SIZE

        public static final int DEFAULT_TAG_BUFFER_SIZE
        Default size for the tag buffers.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • MAX_POOL_SIZE

        public static final int MAX_POOL_SIZE
        Default tag handler pool size.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • NEWLINE

        public static final java.lang.String NEWLINE
        Platform specific new line sequence.

      • PRECOMPILE

        public static final java.lang.String PRECOMPILE
        The query parameter that causes the JSP engine to just pregenerated the servlet but not invoke it.

      • JSP_PACKAGE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String JSP_PACKAGE_NAME
        The default package name for compiled jsp pages.

      • TAG_FILE_PACKAGE_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String TAG_FILE_PACKAGE_NAME
        The default package name for tag handlers generated from tag files

      • DEFAULT_JAR_SKIP_PROP

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_JAR_SKIP_PROP

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • TLD_JAR_SKIP_PROP

        public static final java.lang.String TLD_JAR_SKIP_PROP
        Name of system property containing additional list of JARs to skip when scanning for TLDs.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • XML_VALIDATION_TLD_INIT_PARAM

        public static final java.lang.String XML_VALIDATION_TLD_INIT_PARAM
        Name of the ServletContext init-param that determines if the XML parsers used for *.tld files will be validating or not.

        This must be kept in sync with org.apache.catalina.Globals

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • XML_VALIDATION_INIT_PARAM

        public static final java.lang.String XML_VALIDATION_INIT_PARAM
        Name of the ServletContext init-param that determines if the XML parsers used for web.xml files will be validating or not.

        This must be kept in sync with org.apache.catalina.Globals

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • XML_BLOCK_EXTERNAL_INIT_PARAM

        public static final java.lang.String XML_BLOCK_EXTERNAL_INIT_PARAM
        Name of the ServletContext init-param that determines if the XML parsers will block the resolution of external entities.

        This must be kept in sync with org.apache.catalina.Globals

        另请参阅:
        常量字段值
